New Records: Haris Rauf reached 100 T20I wickets in his 69th innings, the third-fastest in T20I history.
Key Match Events: Pakistan won the match by 7 wickets with 15 balls remaining.
Aaron Johnson scored 52 off 44 balls, the highest score for Canada.
Mohammad Rizwan completed 50 catches in T20I cricket.
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan decided to bowl first after winning the toss.
Saim Ayub opened the batting for Pakistan, replacing Iftikhar Ahmed.
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan's batting performance was criticized, with questions about the Rizwan and Babar Azam partnership.
Canada's performance was noted for Aaron Johnson's innings.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a fresh surface in New York.
The article mentioned fan engagement and the importance of the match for both teams.
Others: The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024.
